About This Property
Welcome to this charming two bedroom, one and a half bathroom real estate gem! This tastefully designed home offers a comfortable and inviting open concept living space, perfect place to call home.

Upon entering, you'll be greeted by an open and airy floor plan that maximizes the available space. The living room is bathed in natural light, creating a warm and welcoming ambiance. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with stainless steel appliances, ample countertop space, and plenty of storage for all your culinary needs. This kitchen will undoubtedly inspire your inner chef.

The two bedrooms in this home are a nice size and provide peaceful retreats after a long day. Each room offers generous closet space and large windows that allow for natural light to fill the rooms.

Outside, the property showcases a well-maintained yard to enjoy the fresh air.

This home provides easy access to local amenities, schools, parks, and shopping centers. Commuting to nearby areas is a breeze with convenient transportation links and major highways within close proximity.

Don't miss the opportunity to make this wonderful home your own! First, security deposit, broker fee and 650 credit score required.
